item.title: Paul Andrew Williams Presents ‘Dragonfly’ to Edinburgh: “I Come From Making Stuff for Nothing… This Is a Truthful Film”
item.description: The director returns to EIFF with his new film, led by Andrea Riseborough and Brenda Blethyn, after nabbing the New Director’s Award for ‘London to Brighton’ in 2006: “It makes me a little bit emotion
